name: Redemption of Liuyin
summary: This is a 3D ancient style fantasy, multi ending action role-playing game. As the third installment of the Ryukyu Hidden series and the Ryukyu Hidden Nine Absolute Reincarnation Chapter, the game is designed with the principle of promoting offense and hesitation to defeat in its combat system.

name: Theurgy Architect
summary: Are you ready to wield the power of creation? In Theurgy City, you are the divine architect. With just a touch, reshape the land and watch as your intelligent citizens build a thriving metropolis around your will.

name: Queen Slayer
summary: 'Queen Slayer' is a turn-based RPG set in a fascinating fantasy world. The player must lead heroes of various professions and skills to defeat the powerful queens who dominate the underground dungeons and save the kingdom from darkness.

name: Turtle Riders
summary: Choose your weapons and ride your giant turtle while hordes of enemies try to take you down. Gather orbs to upgrade and pick the right skills to survive the long road to the outpost!

name: Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City
summary: In the trade city of Marigold, a spirited woman, Lilia, sets off on her grand adventure. However, while exploring the dungeon, she runs into a potential ally, Sheryl. Can these two opposing personalities work together to survive the dungeon?

name: Meow Delivery: Fish Frenzy
summary: Speed, skill and whiskers - can you master the fishy rush?

name: Pocket Room Sanrio Characters
summary: A new Tamagotchi based on Sanrio characters.

name: Delta Z. INC
summary: Delta Z Inc. is a horror sci-fi puzzle game where you work as a repurposing technician, responsible for modifying reanimated bodies to suit the needs of your clients while keeping within the company's budget.

name: Assemble Ensemble
summary: Assemble Ensemble is a music-themed factory-building game, that offers a variety of fun melodies, for you to recreate by cleverly placing machines and conveyors!

name: Scrap Dealer Simulator
summary: Run your grandfather’s old scrapyard, collect and dismantle scrap, craft materials, and sell them at the second-hand shop. Manage hunger and thirst while upgrading your business with new machines, storage, and vehicles. Pay off your debts, expand your scrapyard, and turn junk into fortune!

name: Rogue Rampage
summary: A high-speed FPS where you harness powerful skills, combined with roguelike elements in a survival shooter. Level up, acquire powerful items, and fight against stronger enemies to stay alive! Build a different loadout in every run and discover the best strategy to dominate the battlefield.

name: Jar Head Cauldron
summary: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use “In World Crafting” to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.

name: Otaku Miracles
summary: A story about you, an anti-social Otaku who is a student at Ashikaga Academy, a very traditional private high school in Japan. Suddenly, you awaken in a place called the Spirit Realm and are tasked with saving the world! How? Well, with the help of your friends of course!

name: Sigma War Notes
summary: This is an ACT action game that can achieve a satisfying sense of impact through simple operations.

name: Grit Porn Video Tapes
summary: Babsy, a former porn actress, wakes up abruptly in a deserted spa, surrounded by an eerie silence echoing off lifeless walls. The only activity traces are old cameras, CRT televisions, and scattered VHS tapes as remnants of a forgotten past. With no memory, no explanation.

name: Esau's World
summary: Esau's World is a companion-based puzzle platformer where you rely on your brother Esau to solve puzzles in tandem. Create plans using Esau, explore the atmospheric world of Esau's imagination, and mend the relationship of a broken family.

name: 5 Nights at Bobr Kurwa
summary: Beaver Lyolik ate too many mushrooms and became a KURWA! Only the chosen ones can survive these 5 nights!

name: Mine Clicker: Base Craft Building Game
summary: Tap, Mine, Build—Create Your Ultimate Base!
